TextView.android:text: 5-7 Muscle Ups (g)
x5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
8x 15kg Pull Ups ---> 12x 15kg Dips
x3 Sets (3-4 mins rest inbetween sets)
2-4 One Arm Push Ups (E/S)
x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
7-8 Skull Crushers ---> 10 Russian Push Ups
x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
10 Straight Bar Dips ---> 10 Pull Ups + 10.10.10. Isometric Hold
x2-3 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
8 Bar Leg Raises ---> 10 second Front Lever Tuck
x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
10x 80kg Squats ---> 8x 40kg Lunges (E/S)
x3 Sets (4 mins rest inbetween sets)
15x 60kg Squats ---> 15x 20kg Lunges (E/S)
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
1 min 20kg Wall Sit ---> 1 min Wall Sit
x4 Sets (2-3 rest inbetween sets)
Max 40kg One-Legged Calf Raises ---> 20 One-Legged Calf Raises
x3 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
7 Muscle Ups (g)
x2 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
6 Muscle Ups (g)
x2 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
5 Muscle Ups (g) ---> 10 Straight Bar Dips
x2 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10 Pull Ups ---> 10 Chin Ups
x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
10 Russian Dips ---> 5 Dips ---> 10 Russian Push Ups
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
15x 70kg Squats ---> 15x 20kg Bulgarian Split Squats (E/S)
x4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
20 Jumping Lunges (E/S) ---> 30 Jumping Squats
x3 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Muscle Ups (g)
x5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
20 seconds Front Lever Tuck
x5 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
20 seconds Back Lever Tuck
x5 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
10 seconds L-Sit Hold
x5 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
End of Intermediate Program Level 1 - Week 2
RATE YOUR PERFORMANCE
Do not progress on to Week 3 until 10 Muscle Ups with the green band can be achieved.
